mapper.select: select s.id, s.status, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.full_name, s.gender, s.code, d.name as deptName, p.position_name as positionName, s.telephone, s.email, s.entry_date, s.country_name, s.address_1, s.address_2, s.birthday, s.certificate_type, s.certificat_picture_1, s.certificat_picture_2, s.employee_picture, s.created_time, s.updated_time, s1.full_name as createdName, s2.full_name as updatedName, s.open_account, s.dept_id, s.position_id, s.country_code from ope_sys_staff s left join ope_sys_dept d on s.dept_id = d.id left join ope_sys_position p on s.position_id = p.id left join ope_sys_staff s1 on s.created_by = s1.id left join ope_sys_staff s2 on s.updated_by = s2.id where s.dr = 0 and s.id = #{id}
select count(*) from ope_sys_staff s where s.dr = 0

sql.if: and (s.full_name like concat('%', #{enter.keyWord}, '%') or s.telephone like concat('%', #{enter.keyWord}, '%') or s.email like concat('%', #{enter.keyWord}, '%') )

mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( role_name SEPARATOR ',' ) as roleName,GROUP_CONCAT( id SEPARATOR ',' ) as roleId FROM ope_sys_role WHERE id IN (SELECT role_id FROM ope_sys_user_role where user_id = #{staffId}) and dr = 0

select s.id, s.code, s.first_name, s.last_name, s.full_name, s.telephone, s.email, s.status, s.created_time, d.name as deptName, p.position_name as positionName, s.open_account from ope_sys_staff s left join ope_sys_dept d on s.dept_id = d.id left join ope_sys_position p on s.position_id = p.id where s.dr = 0
order by created_time desc limit #{enter.startRow},#{enter.pageSize}
select id as principal, full_name as principalName from ope_sys_staff where dr = 0 and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
SELECT user_id from ope_sys_user_role where role_id = #{id}
